structure.unit: ARTICLE B. - WATER AND SEWER EXTENSION POLICIES
Sec. 8-2069. - INSPECTION AND APPROVAL BEFORE CONNECTING.

law.text: Upon the completion of the construction and laying of the utility lines as authorized by this article for connection, and upon inspection and approval thereof by the City, the dedicators shall be permitted to connect such private utility lines with the utility lines and systems of the City upon the terms and conditions prescribed by this Code.
